text: Red Lady may refer to: *Red Lady of El Mirón, a female paleolithic skeleton *Red Lady of Paviland, a male paleolithic skeleton *Red Lady of Huntingdon College, a ghost ==See also== * The Lady in Red (disambiguation) * The Woman in Red (disambiguation) * Scarlet woman (disambiguation) * The Woman in the Red Dress, a minor character in the movie The Matrix * Women in Red, a Wikiproject to create new articles about notable women
title: Red Lady
